thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 9 of 105
thread.title: Mr Bottomley
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Mr Bottomley

author: Mr Bottomley
title: Mr Bottomley
text:
My most recent order was my fourth order from LDMountain Centre and I have never had any problems. The bags ordered have arrived quickly and on my last order I actually emailed the site to ask if the bag could be delivered before the last date in the delivery window. I received an email back very quickly with details of when it would be send and using what method.
I am a returning customer and will have no hesitation to continue to order through them and advise to others to do the same. Great service.
